title: Medenica se ponovo „javio“, Knežević vjeruje da nije bot, dok direktor UP tvrdi da je sve AI
AI bills by local lawmakers intended to protect the vulnerable could encounter hurdles
description: Local lawmakers are pursuing regulation of artificial intelligence, but they may be hindered by an executive order from President Donald Trump and AI companies’ unwillingness to cooperate.

title: Claude AI Builds ‘10 Minute Gita’ iPhone App From Scratch Without Human Coding
description: No coding, just artificial intelligenceAI helped a developer launch a Gita app without coding.

title: Women Face Higher AI Job Risk in Tech and Finance
description: An estimated 119,000 office-based jobs in technology, finance and professional services — roles largely held by women — could be automated away over the next decade.

title: AI Tool of the Week: Whiteboard your 30-page strategy with Gemini's nanobanana
description: This AI tool goes beyond word-for-word translation by adapting tone, context, and audience. It helps professionals communicate clearly across languages, cultures and use cases.
